intro.p: The Remoting Facility configures and provides access to remote components.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: By using this facility, the container is able to configure components (publishing and consuming) on the .net remoting runtime. Its usage and configuration may vary depending on what your requirements are. Please read this documentation carefully to see if it fits for your needs.
We also assume that you know at least the basics of .net remoting support.

section.title: Site Map
section.p: Please consult the others documents to learn more about the Remoting facility.

section.title: Required Assemblies
section.p: This facility code is on Castle.MicroKernel assembly.
